zh.name: 癮雜誌 FLIPr
zh.description: 每日嗑雜誌，天天長知識。

zh.name: 逢甲影音 FLIPr
zh.description: 逢甲大學新媒體，帶給全球創新價值，更是您無所不在的學習雲！

zh.name: 喇新聞 FLIPr
zh.description: 茶餘飯後喇新聞，天下大事盡知曉。

zh.name: MV不解釋 FLIPr
zh.description: 網羅YouTube超過萬首音樂MV，一指翻閱，簡單上手，輕鬆站在MV最前線！

zh.name: 音樂圖書館 FLIPr
zh.description: 音樂就像一塊拼圖，總有屬於它的故事和適合的位置。証聲希望能幫每個音符都找到它的家！

zh.name: 網路大明星 FLIPr
zh.description: 千奇百怪的網路名人一籮筐。想走在潮流尖端，還沒下載「網路大明星 FLIPr」你就太弱了！

zh.name: 關鍵評論網 FLIPr
zh.description: News worth knowing, voices worth sharing 分享觀點從這開始

zh.name: GOOD TV FLIPr
zh.description: 好消息電視台，是重視家庭價值、關懷社會與人心，帶給人們信心、希望、與真愛的電視台！

zh.name: 華視 FLIPr
zh.description: 記憶中的老朋友，老三台「華視」創新APP。現在就來翻！給您驚奇無限。

en.name: Crash Course on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: This app enables you to watch fun, educational videos from John & Hank Green's YouTube channel on-the-go, or on the big screen with Chromecast!

en.name: Network A on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Fill those 10-minute breaks with adrenaline-pumping stunts including skateboarding and much more on-the-go, or on the big screen with Chromecast!

en.name: CollegeHumor on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Fill those 10-minute breaks with fresh hilarious videos. Watch it continuously on-the-go, or on the big screen with Chromecast support!

en.name: Smosh on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Discover Anthony Padilla & Ian Hecox’s latest funnies on-the-go. This app can also help you watch it on the big screen with Chromecast support!

en.name: Shane on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Discover the latest vlogs from actor, musician, comedian, and video maker - Shane Dawson! Watch it on the big screen with Chromecast support!

en.name: TheFineBros on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Discover the latest videos of Kids/Teens/Elders/YouTubers React and many others on-the-go, or on the big screen with Chromecast support!

en.name: NBA on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Simply flip and discover the latest NBA moments all in an immersive experience. Watch it continuously on the big screen with Chromecast support!

en.name: History on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Discover the latest videos from the channel History. You can also watch it continuously on the big screen with our brand new Chromecast support!

en.name: SpinninRec on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Stay up to date with the latest electronic dance music from Spinnin’ Record! Take the music with you, or watch it on big screen with Chromecast!

en.name: JoeyGraceffa on FLIPr Unofficial
en.description: Discover the popular YouTuber Joey's new vlogs and old funnies on-the-go. You can also watch it continuously on the big screen with Chromecast!

en.name: 丁丁電視, Ding Ding TV
en.description: 丁丁電視是美國首創華語網絡電視、矽谷創新頻道及視頻製作公司。Ding Ding TV is the first Chinese American Internet TV for Silicon Valley
